title: What's new in v2.8.0
content:
FEATURES:
- BIG: INDEX MODE, Aseprite compatibility included

ENHANCEMNETS:
- Removed the flickering when using eyedropper and color replace
- Drawing tools with 0% opacity act as the eraser regardless of whether watercolor is on or off

FIXES:
- Typo that leads to dithering and spraying intensity mix-up
- Line tool sometimes doesn't draw properly with perfect angle on and even stroke size
